我为各位准备了惊喜礼物哦！希望我小小的礼物能给大家带来大大的喜悦，祝大家今天开心！
为各位准备了惊喜礼物！希望这份小小的礼物可以给各位带去多多的快乐。今天也要幸福呀！

9월 11일 오후 12시부터 10월 2일 오후 12시까지 메럿마켓 특별 판매 탭에서 계정 당 1회에 한해 아이템 구매가 가능합니다.
You can purchase this item once per account from the Special Offers tab of the Meret Market between 8:00 AM on 1/17 and 8:00 AM on 1/31.
You can purchase this item once per account from the Special Offers tab of the Meret Market between 8:00 AM on 2/7 and 8:00 AM on 2/28.
10월 23일 낮 12시부터 11월 13일 낮 12시까지 메럿마켓 특별 판매 탭에서 계정 당 1회에 한해 아이템 구매가 가능합니다.
You can purchase this item once per account from the Special Offers tab of the Meret Market between 15:30 on 4/4 and 15:30 on 5/2.
Returning players who log in between 4/25 3:30 PM and 5/2 23:59 will get a special item in the mail. (A returning player is any player who hasn't logged in for 84 days since 1/31/2019.)
Pre-register for the 5/30 update on the MapleFest website between 5/11 and 5/29, and you'll get a special reward in the mail. Limited 1 per account.
Gifts are distributed once per account for logging in with a level 5+ character between 15:30 on 5/30 and 15:30 on 6/27.
You can purchase this item once per account from the Special Offers tab of the Meret Market between 15:30 on 6/27 and 15:30 on 7/25.
It's your pal MC Kay, who you can definitely trust!
It's time for the Opposite OX Quiz, where the only way to win... is to lose!
I've got a fortune cookie with your name on it. It's not just lucky—it's filled with goodies just for you! Go ahead, enjoy it. I'll see you back in Queenstown!
